title: Smartphone X
description: A high-end smartphone with a 6.5-inch display, 128GB storage, and a powerful processor.

title: Laptop Pro
description: A lightweight laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a 13-inch Retina display.

title: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 20-hour battery life and superior sound quality.

title: Smartwatch Series 5
description: A smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, and up to 18 hours of battery life.
